main event: Several residents of East Brunswick, New Jersey observed a bright disk-shaped light in the sky for approximately 5 minutes on February 15, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared to change direction several times during the sighting., The sighting was observed by reputable witnesses including a government official and two professionals., The object reportedly faded in and out of visibility., Weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting., Observers noted that no noise was associated with the object.
witness description: residents of East Brunswick, including a government official and two professional individuals
